node.title: NSW Omicron concerns grow, urgent tests for two more travellers
node.description: Health authorities in NSW are conducting urgent genomic sequencing to determine if two people who arrived in Sydney from southern Africa last night have the Omicron COVID-19 variant.
node.content:
["Health authorities in NSW are conducting urgent genomic sequencing to determine if two people who arrived in Sydney from southern Africa last night have the Omicron COVID-19 variant.", "The pair have tested positive for COVID-19 and are in quarantine.", "Their\u00a0genomic sequencing results expected this evening.", "Two people who arrived in NSW from southern Africa on Saturday evening have already tested positive for the Omicron variant and are in special health accommodation.", "They were the first cases of the new variant to be recorded in Australia.", "Results of genomic sequencing for a person who arrived in Sydney from southern Africa on November 23 and tested positive for COVID-19 yesterday are also expected today.", "NSW Health said initial testing indicated this person was unlikely to have been infected with the Omicron variant.", "This person, who is fully vaccinated and asymptomatic, is isolating at home in Sydney.", "NSW Premier Dominic Perrottet said\u00a0141 people from\u00a0nine southern African countries impacted by the variant \u2014 South Africa, Lesotho, Botswana, Zimbabwe,\u00a0Seychelles, Mozambique, Namibia, Eswatini and\u00a0Malawi\u00a0\u2014 had arrived in NSW over the past 24 hours.", "They have been taken to quarantine facilities and will need to stay there for two weeks.", "The federal government has barred all non-Australian citizens from these countries entering Australia and NSW has introduced new rules which mean those still permitted to arrive must\u00a0isolate in a health facility\u00a0for 14 days.", "Scientists around the world are working to discover if the Omicron variant is more infectious than other strains of COVID, and whether it is more resistant to vaccines.", "Mr Perrottet said his government was \"working very closely\" with the Commonwealth, and that national cabinet would convene later today, or tomorrow, to discuss the new variant.", "\"We don't just need to live alongside COVID, we need to learn to live alongside the variants as well,\" he said.", "\"Ultimately we need to open up to the world [and] we need to do so safely, we don\u2019t need to have a knee-jerk reaction, we need to have a proportionate and balanced response.\"", "The Premier said the government did not plan to\u00a0reintroduce hotel quarantine for all\u00a0international arrivals and that\u00a0he was \"confident\" the high vaccination rate in NSW would keep the community safe.", "He said it was \"too early\" to say what the next steps in combating the variant would be\u00a0but locking down the state for every new variant was \"untenable\".", "The tightened travel rules in response to Omicron mean passengers arriving in NSW from anywhere in the world must now isolate at their place of residence or accommodation for 72 hours.", "This morning, Australia's Chief Medical Officer Paul\u00a0Kelly said he would not speculate on whether Australia was likely to have to close its\u00a0international border again, but authorities were working on a \"risk-balanced\" approach.", "He said early evidence suggested that while Omicron was as infectious as the Delta strain, it did not appear to cause a more severe disease.", "NSW recorded 150 new cases of COVID-19\u00a0in the 24 hours to 8:pm yesterday.", "There were no deaths.", "A total of 94.5 per cent of people aged 16 and above have had their first dose of a COVID-19 vaccine.", "There are 170 COVID-19 patients in hospital with 25 being treated in intensive care units.", "", "
What COVID-19 travel insurance doesn't cover you for(Emilia Terzon)
"]
